title: Introduction
body: Play the introduction video so you can have a better overview over what is coming up next. The training is brought to you by: Benedict Negotiating Seminars, Inc
instruction:
After completing the video you are going to be prompted with a Begin button to go to the 1st scene.

This is a license for the training of 1 person only. Violations should be reported to BNS at 813-655-4272 or local FBI office.

_transcript.inlineTranscriptBody: Transcript body text should go here

title: Scene 1: Digging One's Own Grave
instruction: Play the video and answer the questions so you can carry on to the next scene

_transcript.inlineTranscriptBody: Transcript body text should go here

title: Question 1
body: Who do suppliers primarly target for back door selling questions?

_feedback.correct:
Yes!

And all others except purchasing people.

_partlyCorrect.final:
Yes!

And all others except purchasing people.

title: Question 2
body: The supplier's goal in back door selling is to build their company's negotiating _______________.

_feedback.correct:
That’s correct!

The supplier's goal in back door selling is to build their company's negotiating leverage.

_incorrect.final:
This is not correct.

The supplier's goal in back door selling is to build their company's negotiating leverage.

title: Question 3
body: Which of these is NOT an objective of the supplier's back door selling questions?

_items.text: Don't leave money on the table
Make sure the customer gets a good deal
Make sure that when the negotiation reaches the formal stage - there is nothing left to negotiate

_feedback.correct:
That’s correct!

Make sure the customer gets a good deal is NOT an objective of the supplier's back door selling questions

_incorrect.final:
This is not correct.

Make sure the customer gets a good deal is NOT an objective of the supplier's back door selling questions

title: Scene 2: Understanding Leverage
instruction: Play the video and answer the questions so you can carry on to the next scene.

_transcript.inlineTranscriptBody: Transcript body text should go here

title: Question 1
body: Salespeople keep extensive files about their competitors. If they know who their competitors are, they have a pretty good idea about where they should be on which of the following:

_feedback.correct:
That’s correct!

All of the answers are correct

Salespeople keep extensive files about their competitors. If they know who their competitors are, they have a pretty good idea about where they should be on price, terms, delivery, warranty and freight costs.

_incorrect.final: Yes – and all the rest of these negotiable items as well.

title: Question 2
body: Is it a good idea to emphasize to the supplier how pleased you are with their quality?

_feedback.correct:
That’s correct!

It is NOT a good idea to emphasize to the supplier how pleased you are with their quality

_incorrect.final:
That’s not the case.

It is NOT a good idea to emphasize to the supplier how pleased you are with their quality

title: Question 3
body: If you are exuberant in your praise of the supplier's quality, service, product, etc., it will build their negotiating ______________ at the expense of your company.

_feedback.correct:
That’s correct!

Being exuberant in your praise of the supplier's deliverables you are going to build their negotiating LEVERAGE.

_incorrect.final:
That’s not the case.

Being exuberant in your praise of the supplier's deliverables you are going to build their negotiating LEVERAGE.
